server.inaccessible: Backend unavailable at the moment, please check your connection and try again

instructions.title: Info and Help
instructions.short_description: Touchain helps you visualize the links between people, institutions, former employers and career trajectories of civil servants.

expansion_author.title: Author
expansion_author.question: Who?
expansion_author.content:
We are a group of young professionals with a deep interest in the inner workings of the European project who have often felt hampered in their attempts at participating. Ranging from Medicine to Computer Science backgrounds, our knowledge of EU institutions and digital tools alike has assured us that a better experience is possible for our peers with similar interests.
Originally from Porto, we now cover Portugal, Germany, The Netherlands, Hungary and the UK.

expansion_open_source.title: Open Source
expansion_open_source.content: Both data, and code (for data collection, processing, API, and visualization of Touchain) are available on GitHub.
